author: Al Jazeera
title: 'Chronic' global shortage of coronavirus protective gear: WHO
description: WHO's chief says it has shipped almost two million individual items of personal protective equipment to 74 countries.
content:
A dire lack of protective gear for health workers battling the COVID-19 pandemic is one of the most pressing threats in the fight to prevent deaths, the World Health Organization has warned.
"The chronic global shortage of personal protective equipment is no… [+2204 chars]
